message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly. Fair is fair!
You had your chance, now it's my turn again
I'm willing to give you a little more this time, but let's reach a deal before things get worse.
You're losing value, I'm not. Time to be realistic
I'm willing to go up to 60, but I'm starting to feel like this is pointless. Maybe we can come to an agreement before we both lose out completely.
Your money is losing value fast, don't wait too long
I'm taking a bigger risk now, but I'm hoping you see that we're both losing more with each passing round. Let's find a way to make this work.
You're running out of time, I'm being generous
This is my final offer. We're both losing a lot, and this is the only way to salvage anything at this point. I'm willing to risk it all, but I think it's time for you to be reasonable.
Last chance, take it or leave it
I'm taking a huge gamble here, but I can't let this all go to waste. It's now or never.  I believe in a fair deal, even if it's not ideal. Take it or lose everything.
